title: SAHM Week: I Feel Inadequate
description:
In Praise of Stay-At-Home Moms Week: Since the pandemic's spread…Suzy's “active mom” lifestyle has changed dramatically. - Dr. Laura: "Family loves you in spite of NOT being perfect."

Have you felt imperfect as a mom? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

Order Dr. Laura’s book: “In Praise of Stay-At-Home Moms” go to > https://www.drlaura.com/dr-laura-book-in-praise-of-stay-at-home-moms 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
